'''Azra''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Grand Bazaar]], [[Sumeru City]], [[Sumeru]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player one [[Varunada Lazurite Fragment]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Azra:''' When will I be able to see [[Nilou]] perform again?
:{{DIcon}} About Nilou...
::'''Azra:''' Let me tell you, [[Zubayr Theater]]'s Nilou is the best dancer ever.
::'''Azra:''' Many may be able to dance beautifully, but Nilou is unique in the way she infuses emotions into her dance.
::'''Azra:''' It took me a long time to snap out of such a feeling after watching her performance. It's so...
::{{DIcon|Reward}} That feeling?
:::'''Azra:''' Just like water!
:::'''Azra:''' I mean, pure water can be shaped into different forms, boiled, or frozen...
:::'''Azra:''' *sigh* If I weren't assigned as a guard here, I would like to watch her perform every day.
::;(Obtain {{Item|Varunada Lazurite Fragment|20|x=1}})
:{{DIcon}} See you.
:;(Before completing ''[[Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies]]'')
::'''Azra:''' *sigh* Why doesn't the Akademiya like theaters?
:;(After completing ''Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies'')
::'''Azra:''' The ban on the arts has been lifted, so we should be able to watch more performances now...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Event Dialogue==
===Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Azra:''' You saw it, right, you must've seen it! Nilou's Dance of Sabzeruz!
:'''Azra:''' My word! Such an incredible performance, seeing it once isn't nearly enough... I hope to see her in my dreams every night...
:{{DIcon}} About Nilou...
:;(Same as above)
:{{DIcon}} See you.
:;(Same as above)
{{Dialogue End}}
